data.title: Fujitsu company profile
data.meta_description: In 2022 the revenue growth of Fujitsu stagnated, after peaking in 2018. The company engages in the sector 'Other IT & Computer Services'.
data.text:
All companiesFujitsu

Fujitsu

Fujitsu was founded in 1935 and operates in Minato, Japan. The company engages in the sector 'Other IT & Computer Services' (ISIC: 6209). The industry belongs to the broader 'Information & Communication' (ISIC: J) sector which includes the production and distribution of information and cultural products, the provision of the means to transmit or distribute these products, as well as data, communications and information technology activities, the processing of data and other information service activities.
